body_html:
Having the same problem from the TF source. Gradle version 4.4, Android Plugin Version 3.1.2, TF 1.8

The fix provided by @walkerwjt results in a unresponsive app that updates the viewfinder once every ~10 seconds on my Pixel 2XL running 8.1
